fields.name: San Francisco Public Defender
fields.blurb: The San Francisco Public Defender's Clean Slate program helps people with arrests or convictions in San Francisco.
fields.short_confirmation_message: You should get a letter in the mail from the San Francisco Public Defender in 2-4 weeks.
fields.long_confirmation_message: You should get a letter in the mail from the San Francisco Public Defender in 2-4 weeks.
fields.short_followup_message: Did you get a letter in the mail from the SF Public Defender?
fields.long_followup_message: Have you received your letter in the mail from the San Francisco Public Defender?
fields.address:
San Francisco Public Defender
Attention: Clean Slate Unit
555 7th Street, 2nd Floor
San Francisco, CA
94103

fields.name: Contra Costa Public Defender
fields.blurb: The Contra Costa Public Defender's Clean Slate Program helps people with arrests or convictions in Conta Costa County.
fields.short_confirmation_message: The Contra Costa Public Defender will follow up with you if they need any other information.
fields.long_confirmation_message: The Contra Costa Public Defender will follow up with you if they need any other information.
fields.short_followup_message: With the Contra Costa Public Defender, no news is good news. They'll contact you if they need anything. If you want to check your case, call (925) 335-8000 or email cleanslate@pd.cccounty.us
fields.long_followup_message: With the Contra Costa Public Defender, no news is good news. They will definitely contact you if they need anything. If you'd like to check on your case status, you may call (925) 335-8000 or email cleanslate@pd.cccounty.us
fields.address:
Contra Costa Public Defender
Attn: Clear My Record Unit
800 Ferry Street
Martinez, CA
94553

fields.name: East Bay Community Law Center
fields.blurb: The East Bay Community Law Center offers legal services to low-income communities in the East Bay. EBCLC's Clean Slate Program helps people with arrests or convictions in Alameda County.
fields.short_confirmation_message: Next step in Alameda is to get your CA RAP sheet and send it to EBCLC. More info http://c4a.me/rap
fields.long_confirmation_message:
Your application for Alameda is not yet compete. If you do not have your California criminal record (RAP sheet), please follow these instructions to request it.
http://c4a.me/rap
fields.short_followup_message: For Alameda County, your next step was to send EBCLC your state RAP sheet, so they could check what you qualify for. How is that going?
fields.long_followup_message: For Alameda County, your next step was to send your state RAP sheet to East Bay Community Law Center, so they could check what you qualify for. How is that going? Were you able to get your RAP sheet?
fields.address:
East Bay Community Law Center
Attn: Clean Slate
3130 Shattuck Ave
Berkeley, CA
94705

fields.short_followup_message: With the Alameda Public Defender, no news is good news. They'll contact you if they need anything. If you want to check your case, call (510) 272-6600 or email cleanslate@acgov.org
fields.long_followup_message: With the Alameda County Public Defender's Office, no news is good news. They will definitely contact you if they need anything. If you'd like to check on your case status, you may call (510) 272-6600 or email cleanslate@acgov.org.
